APR.caption: url
APR.doc: Enter the full Daily URL for the room the user should join. If you don't have a URL yet, you can add one with the Daily - Create room action. The URL should be in the format https://your-daily-domain.daily.co/room-name
APR.name: url

APS.caption: token
APS.doc: Optionally enter a meeting token to configure the video session on a per-user basis. To create a meeting token, use the daily - create meeting token action.
APS.name: token
